ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.

agentConfig.description:
<llm-instruction>This part of the input schema is truncated. currentVersion.description: The current version of the agent.

hostname.description: The name of the host where the agent is runnning.

importHash.description: The hash of the structure used to compare with new import version.

importLabel.description:
The user-defined import label that allows the system to group resources from the
same import operation.

isAPEXReachable.description: True if the apex is reachable.

isAPEXTrusted.description: True if the apex is trusted.

managedCAState.description: The state of the managed CA.

ping.description: The last ping recorded for the agent.

start.description: The start time for the agent.

systemProxyManagementState.description: The state of the system proxy management.
